Description.Text:
Property Location
Hotel Trianflor is in the heart of Puerto de la Cruz, walking distance from Plaza del Charco and Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Ermita de San Juan and Castillo San Felipe.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 185 individually decorated guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Digital television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an outdoor tennis court, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a swim-up bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-out, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a swim-up bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an outdoor tennis court, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and babysitting/childcare.
Make yourself at home in one of the 185 individually decorated guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Digital television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers.

Hotel Trianflor is in the heart of Puerto de la Cruz, walking distance from Plaza del Charco and Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Ermita de San Juan and Castillo San Felipe.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Plaza del Charco - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Ermita de San Juan - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Castillo San Felipe - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Taoro Park - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Garden Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Sitio Litre Garden - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Loro Parque - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Casino Puerto de la Cruz - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Lago Martianez Swimming Pools - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Mirador de La Paz - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Botanical Garden of La Orotava - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Pueblo Chico - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Bollullo Beach - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Trianflor is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 40.8 km / 25.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
